ocr_result.text: [TITLE]  Top ten list of quantum mechanics you encounter

Lasers are an acronym for light amplification by stimulated emission of radiation. Einstein and another physicist named Bose discovered that when you have a lot of photons around, they can encourage other photons to be emitted at just the right time to all be in synch (similar to a wave at a football stadium).
